sentence.Network_en: She was an old - fashioned wife, entirely complaisant to her husband's will.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是位 旧式 的妻子, 对丈夫百依百顺.
她总是又殷勤,又乐于助人.

sentence.Network_en: He has a  pretty and complaisant wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有个漂亮又温顺的妻子

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... placebo n 安慰药 complaisant a 讨好的 plate n 盘子（盘子中间是平的）.
英语词根3 - 豆丁网 ... complacent 词足的 complaisant 殷勤的 displease 惹词.
英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... complaisance 彬彬有礼 complaisant 彬彬有礼的 complanate 平坦的.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... complacent 洋洋自得,自满的 complaisant 谦恭,有礼,顺从的 complement 补足,补充.

list.abs: She speaks with complaisance ., 她说话彬彬有礼.

词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... （sophy 智慧爱智慧哲学） （complaisance n. 彬彬有礼，殷勤，柔顺） （ebo 药品等）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: French, from complaire 'acquiesce in order to please', from Latin complacere 'to please'

entry.def: If you are complaisant, you are willing to accept what other people are doing without complaining.

means.word_mean: 1. showing a cheerful willingness to do favors for others;

sentences.sentence: "to close one's eyes like a complaisant husband whose wife has taken a lover"
"the obliging waiter was in no hurry for us to leave"

auth_sentence.content: So she did want to talk about her broken engagement. Always complaisant, he put the letter away.
auth_sentence.res_content: So she did want to talk about her broken engagement. Always complaisant, he put the letter away.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So she did want to talk about her broken engagement. Always complaisant, he put the letter away.

auth_sentence.content: Both the latter forms serve this rubbery-faced Frenchman well in his featured role as a kind of a complaisant contemporary clown.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both the latter forms serve this rubbery-faced Frenchman well in his featured role as a kind of a complaisant contemporary clown.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both the latter forms serve this rubbery-faced Frenchman well in his featured role as a kind of a complaisant contemporary clown.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+plac平静+ent……的→全部平静→无进一步的要→自满的
com全部+plais=plac平静+ant……的→让[别人]平静舒服→讨好的
im不+placable易平静的→adj.难以满足的,难平息的
plac平静+able能……的→adj.易平息的,易和解的
plac平静+ebo表示药品→平静的药

sentences.cn: 她总是又殷勤,又乐于助人。
